tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very friendly and she always carries smile in her face and also explain things cleary.We were visiting doctor from 6th month of pregnancy  to till delivery.She makes us feel home and very comfortable.Doctor waited for labor even after completion of  40 weeks of pregnency and pused for normal delivery. We are extremely happy with her treatment and and patience.We highly recommend to each and everyone who are looking for gynaecologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Exercise,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Doctor is very friendly and she always carries smile in her face and explains things very clearly.We we’re visiting doctor from 6 th month of pregnancy to till Depivery.She makes us feel home and very comfortable.We are extremely happy with her treatment and patience as she waited for labor even after completion of EDD ( 40 weeks of pregnancy ) and pushed for normal delivery.we highly recommend to each and everyone who are looking for gynaecologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I really don know where to start.. this doctor is amazing... I'm an obese 3 class woman and I visited this doc for my delivery.. my first pregnancy.. during all my visits.. she would just say that everything is fine... just be the same.. she never scared or talked about complications etc.. even during my delivery.. when everyone in my family was worried that I would have to go thru a C section.. she just told me that we should wait for a normal delivery... and indeed I had a normal delivery... a very friendly doctor.. amazing and does not scare u with any jargons and issues.. she always looks calm and is the best... I would rate her more than the best.. (if any category is available like that)if you are looking for a good gynaec and obsterician.. I think you can just go ahead with her.. don have 2 thoughts about it at all..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I never post reviews online but my terrible experience with Dr Savitha is something I felt I was obligated to share. 

So I went to her for irregular periods. She gave me some tablets that helped but time spent in trying to explain what was actually going on with me was zero. In fact when I simply asked "What exactly should I tell a dietitian if they ask me what my condition is" rather than stating what was going on or taking the time out to explain things to me, she just brushed it off and said "Show them your scan they will get it". She has zero concern for trying to make the patient understand what is going on. Apart from this, time spent in general is extremely limited, looks like she's always in a hurry to get somewhere and she's doing us a favor? Terrible. My experience with her today broke the camels back which prompted me to go out of my way to create an account on Practo just to post this. She prescribed me some medication *** * *** ****** * *** **** **** ******** ********* *** ****** ***** **** **** ***** **** **** *** ***** ***** ***** *** ***** *** ********* *** ** **** Savitha's actual visit in itself is as short as a 2min phone call.. but rather than saying what I needed to do she said she would have to see me even before hearing what I had to say.. Before I could ever talk about what happened she told me I needed to come down to the hospital. ********* ***** **** ***** **** ** ** *** *** ****** 

In summary, she does not explain the problem at hand, brushes things off and does not talk about what to do unless asked *** **** *** **** **** *** ** ********** *** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
** ****** ****** *** ********** ***** ****** ************** ************* *** ************** ** *** ***** * **** ** ** **** ***** *********** **** **** 
I asked her as a 30 year old, are there things I need to be concerned about problems that can happen with pregnancy post 30, and she snapped saying she cannot and will not address my questions as I'm not married and these are future concerns. She went on to say that as a lay person I'm not equipped to understand the answers to the questions I've raised, *** ** *** ********** *** ********* ********** I walked out of the session as that point. 

It's not okay that you treated me this way and you should know your words can hurt and shake up a person

I hope whatever made her so bitter *** ******* ***** ***** *** ************ ****** ** ******** *** *** ******* ** ****** ***** **** ** ************ *** *********** ******* ****** **** *** *** *** ************ *********

tags: None
review:
Doctor suggested all the tests worth around 10K and later upon getting all the tests done with all efforts, Doctor do not have patience to answer our queries,
Doctor will be completely in hurry burry state of mind.

Everything was well in the first visit and upon next visit, doctor have separate time to check the follow up patients itseems and we Never knew that, or if we go outside of that time we have to pay itseems.

Not recommended for the newly married couple if you are visiting to this doctor. You can have a list of your questions ready and doctor will just answer as avoid junk food and will tell everything will be just in place at the right time.  I know doctor will be having all the answers for the questions asked but even we should know what are those answers right, just yes yes yes.. will never answer our question. 

You have to wait for days together to get your reports done at Apollo and Never expect on spot reports, schedule your appointment and wait for reports at the Report counter till they provide and even in Apollo clinic you will never get ORS solution.

tags: Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: Appointment time is 10:45 am. Doctor not showed up till 12pm. Support staff are not friendly. Practo mentioned it's a guaranteed less than 60mins waiting time. What's the whole point of saying this? Chatted with customer support but not received any proper response. I ended in cancelling appointment. Used practo for first time and this will be last time too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
She is a good doctor.   But the hospital restroom are smelly and during the meeting with doctor,  somebody called doctor in phone to finish my appointment soon.  Other patient is waiting. And doctor had to reply I am with a high risk patient so I have to discuss in detail with patient.  I am not wasting time here. 

Hospital facilities people are forcing doctor to finish appointment with patients soon,  so that other patients need not wait much. 

I know Dr savitha madam,  she is very responsible towards a patient,  she never does time pass with patient. I request the hospital authority,never force doctor to finish the patient appointment soon. 

I request hospital to have clean and smell free restroom in -1 floor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: disappointed with practo, had to pay 800 where in the fee shows 740, not acceptable.. pls check this asap

But receptionist of the hospital was the bad experience... they took 20 min to give bill

She doesn't make us scared which is a good point about her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is really friendly and approachable.Her way of treatment. and consulation gives a soothing and calm experience which is very well necessary at this point of time

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor invested time in understanding the past history n earlier diagnosis. Also she explained every detail that I need to know. She was very patient and made us understood in depth the mattter related to my issue. Over all a very satisfying meeting with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am happy with the last visit has she prescribed a medicine for 3 days to get the abnormal bleeding to control and later wrote scans n few tests to be done.  she examined personally n then to a complete details about the life style n previous treatments I had..  way too friendly n very good advice about all the things more likely

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.savitha Shetty is our family gyanec since 2010. She has handled my high risk pregnancy with great care and lot of patience. She is the best among many well know gyanecs I have met. 
Our family is grateful to her for the medical expertise, care she shared during mine, my sister, my sister in law, friend's pregnancy.
God bless Dr.Savitha great success

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very experienced * **** ********** ******* Was very Patient in listening & explaining everything to us. Other doctors in cloud nine do not spend so much time on each patient but Dr.Savitha was a very interactive & went into details.  Will definitely recommend her & hope she remains the same.
